subject: Hockey, Ice
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Dan Girardi, who went undrafted, leads all N.H.L. players in ice time this season but is a long shot to make the All-Star team.
snippet: Defenseman Dan Girardi, who went undrafted, leads all N.H.L. players in ice time this season but is a long shot to make the All-Star team.
